verses.text: \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rule|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w*, \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*; \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w troubled|strong="H6470"\w* \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* wonder-workers, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* users \w of|strong="H4428"\w* secret arts, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* those \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H7121"\w* use \w of|strong="H4428"\w* evil powers, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Chaldaeans, \w were|strong="H3778"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* clear \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*. \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w took|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w places|strong="H0559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3045"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w troubled|strong="H6470"\w* \w by|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* desire \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* clear \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H2472"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* Chaldaeans \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* Aramaean language, O \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, \w have|strong="H4428"\w* life \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*: \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H1696"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* an account \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H1696"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* we \w will|strong="H4428"\w* make clear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3046"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* Chaldaeans, \w This|strong="H4406"\w* \w is|strong="H2493"\w* my decision: \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H2006"\w* \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* clear \w to|strong="H0560"\w* me \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* sense \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w*, \w you|strong="H2006"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* be cut \w in|strong="H4430"\w* bits \w and|strong="H6032"\w* your \w houses|strong="H1005"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* waste.

But \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H2006"\w* make clear \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w*, \w you|strong="H2006"\w* will have \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* offerings \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w great|strong="H7690"\w* honour: \w so|strong="H2006"\w* make clear \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w*.

\w A|strong="H6032"\w* \w second|strong="H8579"\w* \w time|strong="H8579"\w* they \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* answer, Let \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* give his \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* an account \w of|strong="H4430"\w* his \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* we \w will|strong="H4430"\w* make clear \w the|strong="H0560"\w* sense.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w I|strong="H0576"\w* am certain \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* attempting \w to|strong="H0560"\w* get \w more|strong="H4481"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w see|strong="H2370"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* decision \w is|strong="H1768"\w* fixed;

\w That|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* do \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* clear \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* only \w one|strong="H2298"\w* fate \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* have \w made|strong="H3046"\w* ready \w false|strong="H3538"\w* \w and|strong="H6925"\w* evil \w words|strong="H4406"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w say|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* till \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*: \w so|strong="H1768"\w* give \w me|strong="H6925"\w* an account \w of|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H6925"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* be certain \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* able \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* sense \w of|strong="H6925"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* clear.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Chaldaeans \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* answer, \w There|strong="H0383"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w a|strong="H6032"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w earth|strong="H3007"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* make clear \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king's business; \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, however \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* power, \w has|strong="H1768"\w* ever made \w such|strong="H1836"\w* \w a|strong="H6032"\w* request \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* wonder-worker \w or|strong="H3809"\w* user \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w secret|strong="H4406"\w* arts \w or|strong="H3809"\w* Chaldaean.

\w The|strong="H1768"\w* king's request \w is|strong="H1768"\w* a very hard \w one|strong="H0321"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w there|strong="H0383"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w other|strong="H0321"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* able \w to|strong="H6925"\w* make \w it|strong="H1321"\w* clear \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w but|strong="H3861"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* living-place \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1321"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H6903"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w angry|strong="H1149"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* full \w of|strong="H4430"\w* wrath, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w for|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* destruction \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

So \w the|strong="H6992"\w* order \w went|strong="H5312"\w* out that \w the|strong="H6992"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* were \w to|strong="H1156"\w* be put \w to|strong="H1156"\w* death; \w and|strong="H1841"\w* they were looking \w for|strong="H1156"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w his|strong="H1156"\w* \w friends|strong="H2269"\w* \w to|strong="H1156"\w* put them \w to|strong="H1156"\w* death.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* gave an answer \w with|strong="H8421"\w* wisdom \w and|strong="H4430"\w* good sense \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w captain|strong="H7229"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king's armed \w men|strong="H2445"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w gone|strong="H5312"\w* out \w to|strong="H2942"\w* put \w to|strong="H2942"\w* death \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*;

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w*, O captain \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w why|strong="H4101"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king's order \w so|strong="H0116"\w* cruel? \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* an \w account|strong="H5922"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* business.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H1156"\w* \w a|strong="H1156"\w* \w request|strong="H1156"\w* \w to|strong="H1156"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H1156"\w* \w give|strong="H5415"\w* \w him|strong="H5415"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* would make clear \w the|strong="H1768"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* dream \w to|strong="H1156"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* \w to|strong="H2269"\w* \w his|strong="H3046"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* gave \w his|strong="H3046"\w* \w friends|strong="H2269"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Mishael|strong="H4333"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5839"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* news:

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* might make \w a|strong="H1156"\w* \w request|strong="H1156"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* mercy \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* question \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* secret; \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w friends|strong="H2269"\w* might \w not|strong="H3809"\w* come \w to|strong="H5922"\w* destruction \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* secret \w was|strong="H1841"\w* made clear \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w a|strong="H0116"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w*. \w And|strong="H8065"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* gave blessing \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* answer, May \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w praised|strong="H1289"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* strength \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w*:

By \w him|strong="H6966"\w* \w times|strong="H2166"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* years \w are|strong="H1932"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*: by \w him|strong="H6966"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w are|strong="H1932"\w* \w taken|strong="H5709"\w* \w away|strong="H5709"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w are|strong="H1932"\w* lifted up: \w he|strong="H1932"\w* \w gives|strong="H3052"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w to|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w* \w to|strong="H3052"\w* those whose minds \w are|strong="H1932"\w* awake:

\w He|strong="H1932"\w* \w is|strong="H1932"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* unveiler \w of|strong="H1541"\w* \w deep|strong="H5994"\w* \w and|strong="H1541"\w* secret things: \w he|strong="H1932"\w* has knowledge \w of|strong="H1541"\w* \w what|strong="H4101"\w* \w is|strong="H1932"\w* in \w the|strong="H3046"\w* dark, \w and|strong="H1541"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* light has \w its|strong="H3046"\w* living-place \w with|strong="H5974"\w* him.

\w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w give|strong="H3029"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w praise|strong="H7624"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* worship, O \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w me|strong="H3052"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* strength, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* clear \w to|strong="H1156"\w* \w me|strong="H3052"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* requesting \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* us knowledge \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* king's business.

\w For|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* reason \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Arioch|strong="H0746"\w*, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w given|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* destruction \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*, Do not put \w to|strong="H5922"\w* death \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*: \w take|strong="H5954"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* make clear \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dream.
